customKeycodes.name: DPI_UP
customKeycodes.title: Increase the DPI of the touchpad.

customKeycodes.name: DPI_DN
customKeycodes.title: Decrease the DPI of the touchpad.

customKeycodes.name: DPI_FINE
customKeycodes.title: While held, drops the DPI to minimum.

customKeycodes.name: TAP_UP
customKeycodes.title: Increase the tapping term. This affects mod/layer-tap timing.

customKeycodes.name: TAP_DN
customKeycodes.title: Decrease the tapping term. This affects mod/layer-tap timing.

customKeycodes.name: TAP_ON
customKeycodes.title: Enable tap to click on touchpad.

customKeycodes.name: TP_OFF
customKeycodes.title: Disable tap to click on touchpad.
